result.eng: Copyright is usually held by whoever created the work.
result.ga: Bíonn an cóipcheart leis an té a chum

result.eng: He composed more than ten operas.

result.ponchtml: Ċum sé breis is deiċ gceoldrámaHe composed more than ten operas.

result.ga: Ní mise a chum ná a cheap

result.html: Ní mise a chum ná a cheapIt wasn't my idea.
